    Examples:

    # Determine the number of stones in each level
    level_n = 0
    for i in range(n):

    # Now add the number of stones in the first level to the list
    level_list = [level_n]
    for i in range(n):
        level_list.append(i)
    # Add the number of stones in the second level to the list
    level_list.append(level_n)
    # Add the number of stones in the third level to the list
    level_list.append(level_n)
    # Add the number of stones in the fourth level to the list
    level_list.append(level_n)
    # Add the number of stones in the fifth level to the list
    level_list.append(level_n)
    # Add the number of stones in the sixth level to the list
    level_list.append(level_n)
    # Add the number of stones in the seventh level to the list
    level_list.append(level_n)
    # Return the number of stones in each level in a list
    return level_list
